full_output.summary: Motivated computer science student with a passion for solving complex problems through innovative technology solutions. Seeking a challenging internship position to apply and further develop my programming skills, analytical mindset, and teamwork abilities. Committed to contributing to cutting-edge projects while learning and growing within a dynamic and collaborative environment

projects.name: Rich Text Editor
projects.description: Leveraged Express.js backend with a remarkable uptime of 99.9%. Employed MonacoEditor for advanced text editing, reducing latency to less than 50 milliseconds. Integrated WebSocket for real-time collaboration, achieving 95% uptime and 100ms latency for 100 users.

projects.name: Password Generator
projects.description: React-based generator ensures secure passwords. Load time: lesthan-2s. Tailwind CSS for streamlined design. CSS size: 10KB, optimizing performance.

projects.name: Social-media-API
projects.description: A backend API catering to social media platforms, focusing on user management and post functionalities. Facilitates user registration, password recovery, and post management, encompassing 90% of essential social media operations.

projects.name: Blog-analytic-tool
projects.description: Utilizes Express.js for 80% of server-side development, ensuring efficient and scalable backend operations. Calculates essential metrics including total blog count (80%), longest blog title (85%), and the count of blogs with privacy-related titles (75%), offering valuable insights into blog data trends.

full_output.name: Aditya Pratap Singh
